title: About Me
content: I’m a software engineer with **4+ years of experience** building **production-grade AI and automation systems** that deliver measurable operational impact.

I’ve designed and shipped **20+ end-to-end systems** across **Artificial Intelligence**, **Robotic Process Automation**, and **full-stack development**. My work has eliminated **1,000+ hours of repetitive manual effort**, reducing critical process turnaround times from **days to minutes** in real business environments.

My core strength lies in combining **AI with RPA** to build intelligent automation — from **AI-driven invoice processing pipelines** to **enterprise bots** and **decision-support systems**. I’ve designed **500+ structured prompts**, built automation workflows integrating **APIs, data pipelines, and decision logic**, and contributed to systems handling **high-frequency interactions at scale**.

I hold a **Master’s degree in Information Science** from the **University of Pittsburgh** and bring a strong balance of **engineering depth**, **automation expertise**, and **product thinking**. I’m comfortable owning systems **from architecture to deployment**, ensuring **scalability**, **reliability**, and **long-term value**.
If you’re looking for someone who can **build scalable systems**, **automate intelligently**, and **deliver quantified efficiency gains**, I’d love to connect.
